div.p: The original transcription is not available.

In my report no. 1785 of the political report no. 135 from June 28th 1941, I wrote about the measures taken by general Antonescu against the Jews in Moldova. The official report was issued today. It says that in the town of Jasi, 500 Jewish-Bolsheviks (iudeo-comunists) had been executed for shooting at the German and Romanian soldiers from their houses. The official report also points out that Soviet Russia is, by all the means possible, trying to evocate sabotage, disorder and other aggression acts behind the front. For that reason there are spies and terrorist agents jumping out of planes with parachutes. These are then getting in touch with the agents living in the country and with the Jewish-Bolshevik population (iudeo-comunist population), in order to organise the aggression acts straight away. Some of these agents have been arrested and punished for their acts. The official report also calls attention to the fact, that every attempt to break the peace and order in the country will be punished strictly on the spot.

The calm population is asked to immediately report to the local offices everyone who they suspect, also to report every foreigner who appears in the town. Those who will not report these violators of order and security on time will be executed together with all their family members.

I will just add, it seems to me that with the act against the Jews from Jasi, the current and already difficult situation of the Jews in the country became definitely ruined. It gave the old Romanian antisemitism a new, and this time purely Romanian and national impulse. Whoever stands on the Russian side in the war between Romania and Russia for Bessarabia, cannot expect any respect in Romania anymore.
Made in 4 copies, 3 of them for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and 1 copy to be stored within the records.
